Wick Food Hub and Warm Space – Food for people to share and take away, and free refreshments, alternate Saturday mornings (2nd and 4th each month)
Wick Youth Club - Offering a warm place for young people aged 7 to 21 to attend youth club activities every Wednesday. At the same time parents who wish to stay for a warm cup of tea/coffee or hot chocolate are welcome to do so.
